snippet: Quarterback Cam Newton was named the National Football League's Most Valuable Player on Saturday at the NFL Honors show after a sensational season in which he led the Carolina Panthers to a near-perfect record....
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Cam Newton was named the National Football League's Most Valuable Player on Saturday at the NFL Honors show after a sensational season in which he led the Carolina Panthers to a near-perfect record.

headline.main: Panthers QB Newton Named NFL's Most Valuable Player
headline.print_headline: Panthers QB Newton Named NFL's Most Valuable Player
